tool.name: iBridges upload to iRDOS
tool.command: #import json #set $files = [] #for $i in $range(len($local_collection.keys())) #silent $files.append(($local_collection[$i].false_path, $local_collection[$i].name)) #end for #silent f=open($__tool_directory__+"/files_to_upload.json", 'w') #silent json.dump($files, f) python '$__tool_directory__/ibridges_upload.py' --irods_path '$irods_path' --overwrite
tool.help:
Tool upload files from a Galaxy collection into an iRODS folder.
Choose the Galaxy collection to upload, and specify the iRODS path (needs to be a folder / iRODS collection) to upload to. If your files are not in a collection yet, manually create a collection first. If you do not know the exact iRODS path, you can use the 'iBridges browser for iRODS' interactive tool to obtain the correct path.
